title: Cub Raising Association - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adopted Children   Animal Characteristics   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cold Love Interests   Cute Children   Cute Story   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Interdimensional Travel   Outer Space   Parallel Worlds   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Transported to Another World
author: Jiuyi   酒矣
description:
Xie Luan had always believed in science until one day, a meteorite smashed into his yard, forcing him to bind to a heroic world saving script. The worst thing was that the script didn’t even follow common sense.

Others become superheros while he became a super-nanny. So in his left hand was a “Cub Encyclopedia” and in the right, a small milk bottle to feed the small cub clinging onto his leg.

Today, Xie Luan is trying his best to save the world.>
